// Product.js import React from 'react'; import { FaHeart, FaShare, FaShoppingCart } from 'react-icons/fa'; import '../components/Product.css'; const Product = ({ url, name, description, category, price, rating }) => (
{category}

{name}

{description}

Price: {price}

Rating: {rating}

); export default Product;
